name: Flip side
description:
Flip side is a 2d platformer made in unity. The goal of the game is to get to the golden door. To get to it you must do some platforming and parkouring, at some point you get to choose what path you take: easy, normal or hard.

HOW TO PLAY:

W,A,S,D/ARROW KEY to move

SPACE BAR to jump

R to reset

NOTE: this is my first game. All assets are mine.
